title: Asynchronous E-Learning-Based Foundational Mathematics Course for Adults: Design for Enhancing Learner Satisfaction

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary and Secondary Level Core Mathematics Concepts
context.additional_context: Flexible learning environment centered on asynchronous discussions, assignments, and video lectures for learners provided with digital devices

learning_goals: Learners improve basic mathematical operation skills by 30% within six months in an LMS-based asynchronous environment.
Learners achieve a formative assessment pass rate of over 70% by the end of the course.
Learners attain an average score of 4.0/5.0 or higher in the course satisfaction survey (based on LSAeL).

resources: Foundational Math Concept Videos (20 Modules in 30-Minute Segments)
Weekly Checklist Template for Maintaining Learning Motivation

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
